summary: A small, secluded, Akaviri/blades themed player home situated in the mountains of the reach.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][size=6]Akaviri Retreat[/size][/b]
[left]The Akaviri retreat is a small playerhome I designed for myself. I decided to upload it to the nexus in case anyone happened to be interested in it. The house is made to suit my playstyle and has everything that I need in a playerhome, so don't expect any updates to the file.Â [/left][/center][center]

[size=3]Features:
[/size]
Akaviri/Blades styled home high up in the mountains of the Reach
Detailed interior
Custom storage for clothes, weapons, crafting supplies, and food
A forge, workbench, sharpening thing, alchemy table, and enchanting table
Decent view of the reach[/center]

[size=5]NOTICE: THIS MOD GETS RID OF THE LOVERS STONE. I DON'T THINK IT GETS RID OF IT'S EFFECTS. IF YOU NEED THE LOVERS STONE IN YOUR GAME THEN DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS MOD.[/size]
author: danya23
